summary: Build a simple funding/landing website for an on-demand electrician booking application project, including budget breakdown, benefits, a near-top donation section with a Scan & Pay QR image, plus company branding (logo), contact info, a blue-and-white professional theme, and custom domain setup.
imageRequirements:
## Edit Images
- Create a transparent, tightly-cropped square logo image (FB_IMG_1761927854517.jpg > electrobeez-logo.dim_512x512.png)
- Create a transparent, tightly-cropped horizontal logo lockup (FB_IMG_1761927854517.jpg > electrobeez-logo-horizontal.dim_1200x300.png)
- Create a favicon-sized icon version (FB_IMG_1761927854517.jpg > electrobeez-favicon.dim_64x64.png)

existing_features.title: Create a single-page, responsive funding/landing website that explains the on-demand electrician booking application project (Rapido-like design direction, but for electricians) and is suitable for mobile and desktop browsers.

Add a prominent donation section near the top of the page that displays the uploaded Scan & Pay image with a heading and a short description that explains how donations will benefit the community and the nation.
Include a budget breakdown section that clearly states the funding requirement is 5L and summarizes what the funding covers for completing the mobile app build.

Include a benefits/impact section that highlights: benefits to the electrician community (more leads/business), ITI graduates (skills kickstart and placement opportunities), and broader economic boost.

Apply a cohesive, creative visual theme across the landing page (colors, typography, spacing, section styling) that fits an “electrician services + community funding” concept and avoids a blue/purple-dominant palette.
Update the global Tailwind/Shadcn theme tokens to use a monochrome (white/black/gray) palette, replacing the current amber/orange electrician palette for both light mode and dark mode.

Refactor landing page component styling to remove amber/orange-specific Tailwind classes and gradients, replacing them with a consistent black/white/gray visual treatment while keeping the existing layout, sections, and content unchanged.
Add the uploaded ElectroBeez logo image as the company logo in the top navigation/header and also display the same logo in other sections of the landing page (hero and footer).

Replace the current monochrome theme across the entire site with a professional blue-and-white color palette, updating both light mode and dark mode theme tokens and refactoring component classes as needed to match the new palette consistently.

Add the company contact details (email: electrobeezindia@gmail.com, phone: +918638493216) to appropriate sections of the landing page (at minimum: footer; optionally: header), with clickable mailto and tel links.

Provide a project documentation page that guides the user through making the deployed site accessible via their custom domain on the Internet Computer (DNS records + boundary node/custom domain configuration), including placeholders for the user’s domain name and deployed canister ID.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a simple funding/landing website explaining the on-demand electrician application project, including budget breakdown (5L) and benefits to the electrician community/ITI graduates/economy.
Add a near-top donation section featuring a Scan & Pay QR image with heading and description about how donations benefit the community and the nation.
Configure the website to be accessible via the user's custom domain (domain/DNS setup and deployment configuration).
Add the provided company logo image across the site (top navigation/header, hero, and footer sections).
Replace the current theme with a professional blue-and-white color palette across the entire site.
Add company contact details: electrobeezindia@gmail.com (email) and +918638493216 (phone number) in appropriate sections (e.g., header/footer/contact area).

projectName: Funding landing website for on-demand electrician app (budget + benefits + QR donation section)
